net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Class UncheckedBytes<Underlying>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.AbstractBytes<Underlying>
      • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.UncheckedBytes<Underlying>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Appendable, AutoCloseable, CharSequence, Bytes<Underlying>, BytesStore<Bytes<Underlying>,Underlying>, ByteStringAppender<Bytes<Underlying>>, RandomDataInput, RandomDataOutput<Bytes<Underlying>>, StreamingDataInput<Bytes<Underlying>>, StreamingDataOutput<Bytes<Underlying>>, net.openhft.chronicle.core.ReferenceCounted

    public class UncheckedBytes<Underlying>
extends AbstractBytes<Underlying>
    Fast unchecked version of AbstractBytes

      • unchecked

        @NotNull
public Bytes<Underlying> unchecked(boolean unchecked)
        Description copied from interface: Bytes
        Return a Bytes which is optionally unchecked. This allows bounds checks to be turned off.
        Parameters:
        unchecked - if true, minimal bounds checks will be performed.
        Returns:
        Bytes without bounds checking.
